thread.title: Want to find your next big investment Mine Twitter.
thread.title_full: Want to find your next big investment Mine Twitter.

title: Want to find your next big investment Mine Twitter.
text:
Want to find your next big investment? Mine Twitter. 
CNN Money Saturday 24th October, 2015 
ADSPACE-END --> The tool currently tracks and ranks 300,000 startups (mostly in the tech space) across key Twitter metrics like engagement (tweets, retweets, favorites), follower growth and mentions. The Twitter tool is part of CB Insights' premium subscription service, which costs $39,000 annually. CB Insights cofounder Anand Sanwal said it already has 300 users. At its core, the tool helps subscribers identify hot startups they might want to partner with or invest in. If a startup is getting mentioned a lot on Twitter, or if a lot of people are engaging with its brand, it's a strong indicati...
